title: Create an Electronic Informed Consent (eConsent) Form
description: A clinical operations manager needs to convert a paper informed consent form into an interactive electronic version for a new trial.

tasks.description: Upload the text from the paper ICF into an eConsent authoring tool.
Enhance the form with interactive elements, such as videos explaining procedures and embedded comprehension quizzes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds multimedia and interactive elements to the form.

tasks.description: Configure the electronic signature workflow for the patient and the investigator.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up the required signature fields and routing.

tasks.description: Publish the eConsent form for use in the clinical trial.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes the final eConsent form available to the clinical sites.
